mapper.select: select *, timestampdiff(hour, wDate, now()) as hour_diff, datediff(now(), wDate) as date_diff from community_board where ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%') order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo}, #{pageSize};
select count(*) from community_board where ${search} like concat('%',#{searchString},'%');

select.if: select idx, title, wDate from community_board where idx < #{idx} order by idx desc limit 1;
select idx, title, wDate from community_board where idx > #{idx} order by idx limit 1;

mapper.update: update community_board set readNum = readNum + 1 where idx = #{idx};
